data.description:
FIGHT together against different enemies in the Hex7 Battle Arena.
DEFEND yourself with shield and sword and don't forget to RELOAD your guns once in awhile.
![{"height":1440,"type":"image","width":2560}](https://scontent.oculuscdn.com/v/t64.5771-25/38974468_332017743231769_3438180485989163490_n.png?_nc_cat=105&ccb=1-7&_nc_sid=6e7a0a&_nc_ohc=P44RFZl0B9MQ7kNvgETwLws&_nc_ht=scontent.oculuscdn.com&oh=00_AYB82O_2d2n-tXrJLiEqXUJis6pEvFkruiDklSt5bUgJHA&oe=669E40B7)
SURVIVE the first 7 ROUNDS.
Have FUN customizing your game a much as you like.
![{"height":1440,"type":"image","width":2560}](https://scontent.oculuscdn.com/v/t64.5771-25/75507168_1446865232891556_3763410573840822716_n.png?_nc_cat=109&ccb=1-7&_nc_sid=6e7a0a&_nc_ohc=DfkT3jX_UAgQ7kNvgFNrDCB&_nc_ht=scontent.oculuscdn.com&oh=00_AYCbDgrmQpQBbHbv-2PIFWBvar4Z5HQWqGuGZ0Qd685k-Q&oe=669E4E52)
EXPLORE the Arenas and enjoy the different game modes.
![{"height":1440,"type":"image","width":2560}](https://scontent.oculuscdn.com/v/t64.5771-25/39003262_985625342809911_4235982824831484550_n.png?_nc_cat=105&ccb=1-7&_nc_sid=6e7a0a&_nc_ohc=7QQ-LCas-H4Q7kNvgEbU0te&_nc_ht=scontent.oculuscdn.com&oh=00_AYDdHhyOt8fKvw9zWS6yjCGUidEgzebI5j-dBFPlCu3RZQ&oe=669E3989)
